entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 10:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

Visibility: 12.9 km

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 4.
